vistra.app.control.state

Class SbsStateHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • vistra.app.control.state.SbsStateHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.FocusListener, java.util.EventListener, IControlContext, IStepByStep

    public final class SbsStateHandler
extends java.util.Observable
implements IStepByStep
    A step-by-step handler: handles the step-by-step iteration over a traversal-object.

    As a part of the graphic user interface control, this state handler is a focus listener (step length setting) and an action listener (buttons), too.

    Author:
    Roland Bruggmann (brugr9@bfh.ch)
    See Also:
    ParameterStateHandler, AnimationStateHandler
